## Research Projects

### ğŸ“Š Analyzing Cascading GME Event Using LLM Research Assistant - RPI - Using LLMs to analyze GME cascading events and social media sentiment - Using Scrapy crawler to collect WallStreetBets user data - Establishing correlation models between social media sentiment and financial market volatility
